title: MD
biography: CA. G. Ramaswamy is an Indian Chartered Accountant from Tamil Nadu (Coimbatore) and was the president of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) for the year 2011–12.
aiSummary: G. N. Ramaswamy is a cancer networks specialist with an H-index of 110 at Oncology (Faculty). Has been published in Journal of Applied Polymer Science, Digestive Diseases and Sciences, Journal of Natural Science Biology and Medicine. Based in India.
